name: Throwbot (Mato, Kayode, Smos Bois, Denos)
description:
Worker Bot 359 has lost his head, but this Super Computer core might just do the trick. Are those sirens? They want it back? Get out as quick as you can!

KEEP THE HEAD!

You need the head to finish the level but it's a heavy thing!

RUN, JUMP, THROW AND CATCH!

Move with the WASD or Arrow keys. Throw the head with a  left mouse click and catch it by running over it.

STUCK OR A LITTLE TOO DIFFICULT?

Press R to restart the level or SPACE to slow down time. But be warned. It doesn't slow down the timer! Want to get out of the level? Press ESC to get back to level select.

Good luck, can you beat the Dev's score?

A GAME BY FALCÓ DEMON

Mato : Art/UI/Technical Art

Kayode: Art/UI/Cutscene Art/Web Design/Graphics

Malmaars: Programmer/Game design

DLG: Music/SFX

An entry to the SpeedJam #1
